duties_responsibilities.duty: Manufacture quality custom oligonucleotide products efficiently, within the guidelines set forth by the Quality System.
Operate various oligo synthesis, deprotection, and analytical instrumentation.
Maintain and monitor lab equipment as well as a chemical reagent delivery system.
Perform safe handling and disposal of all synthesis chemicals appropriately and according to EH&S policy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors Degree or Master's Degree preferred in Life Sciences.
